DOC.brief_summary: This study will examine the safety and efficacy of Sepraspray in the following model of abdominal surgery: total proctocolectomy and pelvic pouch with diverting ileostomy via laparotomy to treat ulcerative colitis or familial polyposis. Adhesion formation will be evaluated laparoscopically at ileostomy take down. NOTE: A decision was made to terminate this study in June 2008 due to low enrollment.

DOC.criteria: Patients who are scheduled to undergo a total proctocolectomy and a pelvic pouch with diverting ileostomy. Patients who are pregnant. Patients with ongoing abdominal abscess. Patients with ongoing bacterial peritonitis.
